compatibility.notes: The BSD-Advertising-Acknowledgement license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and conditions in redistributions.
Provide acknowledgment in advertising materials and other distributions.
license.name: BSD-Advertising-Acknowledgement
obligations: Retain copyright notice in redistributions of source code.
Include copyright notice and disclaimer in binary redistributions.
Display acknowledgment in advertising materials mentioning features or use of the software.
Retain acknowledgment in all forms of redistribution.
